name: Mino Saga
description:
Introduction
While back I watched a documentary in which the creator of popular game spoke of how he came up with the idea for the game. He was studying people and find out that people like to build things, and in this game the main objective is to build rows.
I wanted to create a game where you can also build things, but a little more complicated objects not just rows, and Mino Saga was born.
Story
In Mino Saga we follow main character Mino, and his task to rebuild the world. He travels over all continents in the world and build famous landmarks and buildings. In his voyage he is coming across all sort of difficulties, unique for each area he visits.

Gameplay
Mino Saga is new type of puzzle game, it's evolutionary concept for playing pentomino type of games. Mino Saga is mix of two worlds, bringing best of Pentomino games and fast game play.

Features
More than 200 Levels
Challenging game play
Store to upgrade and customize character
7 unique difficulties.
7 areas to explore
Leaderboards
Achivments
Endless game mod

Things we DIDN’T include
Easy game
Naked content (sorry)
Free trip to Moon
